info.kuechler.bmf.taxcalculator.rw

Class TaxCalculatorFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • info.kuechler.bmf.taxcalculator.rw.AbstractReadWriteFactory
      • info.kuechler.bmf.taxcalculator.rw.TaxCalculatorFactory

  • public class TaxCalculatorFactory
extends AbstractReadWriteFactory
    Implementation for a ReadWriteFactory for the BMF tax calculator.

    Example:
    final TaxCalculatorFactory factory = new TaxCalculatorFactory();
    final Writer input = factory.create("2015Dezember").setAllToZero();

    // set values
    input.set("KVZ", new BigDecimal("0.90"));
    // ...

    // calculate
    final Reader output = input.calculate();

    // read
    System.out.println("LSTLZZ " + output.get("LSTLZZ"));

    • Method Detail

      • getCalculatorClass

        protected Class<?> getCalculatorClass(String yearKey)
                               throws ClassNotFoundException
        This method have to be return the class object for the class referenced by your key. You send your (whatever) key and returns a class object.

        Creates a object from following class: "info.kuechler.bmf.taxcalculator.Lohnsteuer" + yearKey + "Big"

        Specified by:
        getCalculatorClass in class AbstractReadWriteFactory
        Parameters:
        yearKey - the key to reference the class
        Returns:
        the class object
        Throws:
        ClassNotFoundException - class does not exists

      • getYearKey

        public String getYearKey(int month,
                         int year)
        Returns the year you to use with AbstractReadWriteFactory.create(String).
        Parameters:
        month - 1..12 for the month, with 0 you can choose the key from the end of year
        year - the year, have to be >= 2006
        Returns:
        the key
